entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish --no-build on ubuntu fails with error: Manifest file at '/someFolder/staticwebassets.build.json' not found. #24772
  • Testhost runtimeconfig is rewritten #24769
  • IncludeAllContentForSelfExtract and pre-publish tasks #24763
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK installed on local OS, "Installation Source" is not localized after running "dotnet workload list" #24762
  • Can not install on Ubuntu 22.04 (jammy) due to libssl1.1 dependency #24759
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK zip installed on local OS, some garbled characters appear when installing wasm-tools for the first time #24757

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't retarget testhost #24770
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24751
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24755
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1707356 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure
